resources.string: The goal of this application is to allow you to mix and mash all styles of music together, putting your DJ skills to the test!
How to map a song to a button:
1. Press the mapping button as seen above. A menu of the default music library on your device will appear.
2. Select desired song to be mapped.
3. Select desired button for song to be mapped onto.
4. Press play to hear song. Press pause if you want to stop playing song.
1. Press the edit button as seen above. Press the button with the song that you desire to edit. A menu will appear with all the settings you can adjust.
2. Adjust your desired settings, then press done.
3. Press play and then press the mapped button that youâ€™ve edited. The same process can be repeated for every song that has been mapped.
